Romelia is a young woman who is 20 years of age, married, and earns her living by selling appetizers. She started this business three years ago, having learned from her mother this ancient trade that is very common in the community of Juticalpense.

Her small appetizer business is set up along the street in front of her parents’ house since she does not have the financial resources to move to another location or rent a shop. Her hours of operation are from 4pm to 10pm. On the weekends, she will close at midnight depending on the numbers of customers that are around.

The loan Romelia is requesting will be used to buy pork, beef, chicken, soft drinks, flour, oil, firewood, vegetables, containers, plastic baskets, and other products. With the help of this loan, she will have what she needs to continue preparing her appetizers and maintaining an active business.

Her greatest problem is that city inspectors are evicting street vendors. However, she is not discouraged by these adversities and presses forward with great determination so that she can have her own shop and her own home.

This is Romelia’s second loan cycle with FAMA and she is a client who has been very punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to buy pork, beef, chicken, soft drinks, flour, oil, firewood, vegetables, containers, plastic baskets, and other products.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 34 years old, married and a mother of two. She knits sweaters to earn a living. She has operated the business for ten years. She previously owned a retail shop.   

She is glad that she joined Faulu Kenya because she has managed to expand her business and sell the knitted sweaters in wholesale.  
Alice hopes to expand her business for more income generation. She has requested for 15,000 Kes which she will use to buy thread.

loans.use: To buy thread

loans.name: Julio Nery

texts.es:
Julio, se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él es empleado de una comercial,  y su esposa le ayuda a atender el negocio en su casa, no tienen un horario para la venta, porque está en su vivienda y esto le permite atender a cualquier hora.
Él necesita realizar la compra de un estante para exhibir la mercadería, también comprara azúcar, frijoles, arroz, aceite, esta inversión le ayudara para tener una mejor presentación para los clientes.
Su aspiración es mejorar el negocio, surtiéndolo de mercadería que sea de calidad, que agrade a los clientes y le sustente las necesidades en su familia.
texts.en:
Julio sells convenience store items for a living.  He lives with his wife and son.  He works for a company and his wife helps him manage their home business.  They don't have set store hours because it is in their home, which allows them to serve people at any time.

He needs to buy a shelf to display his merchandise, as well as to buy sugar, beans, rice, and oil.  This investment will help him offer his customers nicer presentation.

His goal is to improve his business, stocking it with quality merchandise that his customers will like, and to support his family in their needs.

loans.use: to buy a shelf, sugar, beans, rice, and oil

loans.name: Rose

texts.fr: Rose est âgé de 24 ans et est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Léger. Le couple a deux enfants, tous à leur charge. Parmi les deux enfants, il y a un qui est scolarisé ; le second n'est pas encore en âge d'être scolarisé. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par Rose et son mari. Rose a très peu fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Rose prépare de la nourriture (pâte de maïs, accompagné de sauce et de poissons)qu'elle vend. A côté de cette activité, Rose vend des produits divers. Rose achète ses produits dans le plus grand marché du Bénin. Dans le but de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle et par ricochet, d'accroître son chiffre d'affaires, Rose sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits dont Rose avait bénéficié ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Rose, 24, is married to a driver named Léger. The couple have two children, both in school and both under their roof. Of the two children, one goes to school; the second is not yet old enough to be in school. The various expenses of the household are paid for by Rose and her husband. 

Rose did not get to go to school much. To support herself and her children, Rose prepares food (maize porridge with sauce and fish) and sells it. Besides this, she sells various items. She buys her supplies in the biggest market of  Bénin. 

Wishing to better satisfy the demand of her clientele and to grow her turnover, Rose is requesting her third loan from ALIDé. The first two loans she received have both been correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy maize, fish, condiments for sauces, and various products.

loans.name: Carlos Mauricio

texts.es:
Carlos, es un agricultor, muy trabajador y esforzado por su familia, vive con su esposa, aun no tienen hijos, ambos trabajan y se colaboran para poder llevar las obligaciones del hogar, Carlos inicio muy joven con su padre.
Actualmente comprara abono para el cultivo, esta compra le permitirá tener el cuidado para el cultivo, fortaleciéndolo para que la producción sean mejor. El propósito de Carlos es que su trabajo cada día mejore, que puede establecer su vida con una condición económica más estable.
texts.en:
Carlos is a farmer who works very hard for his family.  He lives with his wife; they don't have any children yet.  They both have jobs and they work together to take care of their obligations at home.  Carlos began this work very young with his father.

Currently, he will buy fertilizer for his crop.  This purchase will allow him to take care of his crop, strengthening it so it will have a better yield.

Carlos' goal is for his business to improve every day so he will be able to establish his life with more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to use on his crop

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 30 years old and single.  He runs a butcher shop to earn his living.  He has been in this business for five years and has employed two people.  He also does crop farming for extra income.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save money.  He has used his previous loans to boost his business.

Samuel hopes to expand his business and get more clients.  He has requested 30,000 KES to buy a cow for slaughter.

loans.use: To buy a cow for slaughter

loans.name: Oscar Elias

texts.es:
Oscar, es agricultor, vive con su esposa, tienen dos hijos uno de 4 meses y el otro de 6 años, aprendió con su padre el proceso de la siembra de maíz, por lo mismo se le facilita el realizar la siembra.
Actualmente comprara abono y semilla, para iniciar el trabajo, con estos recursos podrá tener lo necesario para realizar la siembra, trabajando en esta actividad con todos los insumos para que garantizar buena cosecha.
El objetivo de Oscar proporcionar a su familia lo necesario en alimentación, salud, y para sus hijos también educación.
texts.en:
Oscar is a farmer.  He lives with his wife; they have two children, one four-month-old and one six-year-old.  He learned the process of sowing corn from his father, which makes it easier for him to carry out the planting.

Currently, he will buy fertilizer and seeds to start the work.  With these resources he will have what he needs to carry out the planting.  He will be working on this project with all of his supplies to guarantee a good harvest.

Oscar's goal is to provide his family with what they need in terms of food, health, and, for his children, education as well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do maintenance work on his motorcycle

loans.name: Julienne

texts.fr: Julienne, mariée et mère de 1 enfant vit auprès de ses parents. Elle vend divers articles tels que sucre, laits, conserves, Bissaps, etc... dans une boutique sise à Cotonou, la capitale économique du Bénin. Sporadiquement, elle vend aussi les pagnes mais sur commande de ses clients. Elle a une clientèle fidèle composée des habitants de sa localité et des zones environnantes. Julienne exerce cette activité génératrice de revenus depuis environ 2 décennies et en maitrise tous les contours. Elle effectue ses achats près des grossistes au marché international du Bénin. Elle a sollicité et obtenu le renouvellement de son prêt à FINADEV afin de renforcer sa capacité financière à faire face aux multiples exigences de ses clients. Avec les revenus supplémentaires qui découleront de l'exercice de son activité, Julienne contribuera à une meilleure prise en charge des besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Julienne, married and the mother of one child, lives with her parents. She sells various items such as sugar, milk, tinned goods, dried hibiscus flowers, etc. in a little shop located in Cotonou, the economic capital of Bénin. Sporadically, she also sells lengths of African print cloth, but only when her customers order them from her. She has a clientele composed of repeat customers from her neighborhood and surrounding areas. 

Julienne has been in this income-generating business for about 20 years and is quite expert at it. She makes her purchases from wholesalers at the international market of Bénin. She has requested and obtained a renewal of her loan from FINADEV in order to bolster her financial capacity and deal with the multiple needs of her customers. 

With the supplemental revenue that she receives from her business, Julienne will contribute to better covering the needs of her own family.

loans.use: to buy 10 cases of milk, five cases of sugar, and 10 cases of other items.

loans.name: Lorena Dionelis

texts.es:
Lorena, es empleada, vive con su madre y hermanos, ella es empleada y sus hermanos son agricultores, por lo que se les apoya para puedan realizar los cultivos, por el momento se encuentran realizando una milpa y Lorena tramita el préstamo para comprar abono y herbicidas también pagara a sus hermanos y mozos que lleguen a trabajar.
El préstamo le ayudara para que el cultivo sea amplio, en dos manzanas D. terreno, dándole un buen cuido y con la esperanza D. tener D. este alimento para su familia D. manera abundante.
texts.en:
Lorena is an employee.  She lives with her mother and siblings.  Her siblings are farmers and she supports them in growing their crops.  Right now they are sowing a field of corn and Lorena is requesting this loan to buy manure and herbicides.  She will also pay her siblings and some young people who will come to work on the farm.

This loan will help Lorena to ensure that the crops they grow across two 'manzanas' of land (one 'manzana' = 1.68 acres) are successful.  She will proviD. the crops with good care in the hope that she will have abundant supplies of this food for her family.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides

loans.name: Sabina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sabina, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y verduras, ella vive con su esposo y tres hijos, todos son mayores, Sabina tiene como medio de ingreso el negocio en el mercado municipal, su existencia es de 20 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia.
Actualmente comprara verduras, por ejemplo: tomates, chiles, cebollas, papas, güisquiles y también maíz para las tortillas, la inversión le ayudara para aumentar la mercadería en el negocio, adquiriendo frutos frescos que le permitan ofrecer a los clientes.
Su propósito es que el negocio a través del financiamiento, pueda mejorar y atraer más clientes, con ello lograra una mejor rentabilidad y ganancias para cubrir gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Sabina sells tortillas and vegetables for a living.  She lives with her husband and three children, all of whom are adults.  As her source of income, Sabina has her business in the local market.  It has been there for 20 years, so she has experience.

Currently, she will buy vegetables, such as tomatoes, chillies, onions, potatoes, chayote, and also corn for tortillas.  The investment will help her expand her business' merchandise, allowing her to get fresh fruit to offer her customers.

Her goal is that her business, through financing, will be able to improve and attract more customers.  That would allow her to be more cost-effective and to earn more to cover her household expenses.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chillies, onions, potatoes, chayote, and corn

loans.name: 5 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
El comité 5 de Mayo se formó gracias al deseo de mejora y superación del nivel de vida de sus integrantes ya que son personas de muy escasos recursos. Actualmente está integrado por 19 mujeres que trabajan incansablemente para darle a sus familias una vida digna y decorosa.
Una de las miembros es la señora Catalina, ella se define como una mujer trabajadora y muy sacrificada, comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas, gracias a esto ella logra sacar adelante a sus familiares que de ella dependen. Desea poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y de esa forma poder tener el sustento de su familia de forma segura.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones para la posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da,pues de obtener el crédito le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The communal bank "5 de Mayo" was formed because the members had a desire to improve and raise their standard of living, since they are people with very limited resources.  Currently this group is made up of 19 women who work tirelessly to provide their families with a dignified and decent life.  

One of the members of the group is Catalina.  She is described as a selfless and hardworking woman.  She tells us that she has a business selling used clothing, and thanks to this business she has been able to provide for the family members who are dependent upon her.  She wants to continue to grow her business, so that in this way she will be able to have a reliable way to support her family.

She requests a loan to purchase garments, such as T-shirts, shirts, and pants, to later sell.  She thanks the Fundación for the opportunity that they are giving her, as this loan will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy secondhand T-shirts, shirts, and pants to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft cheese, pork rinds, tomatoes and cabbage with which to make her pupusas

loans.name: Kodjo Mensah

texts.fr:
Kodjo Mensah est un homme âgé de 33ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse de bouillie. Il a 02 enfants. 
Kodjo Mensah travaille comme mécanicien d’automobile et vendeur de pièces détachées depuis 2001. Il répare toutes sortes de voiture dans son garage à Bè-Kpota. Il achète les pièces détachées au port autonome de Lomé et au Ghana.
Kodjo Mensah a requis son premier cycle de prêt à  WAGES afin d’acheter des moteurs de voiture. 
Dans les prochaines années, Kodjo Mensah voudrait accroître son  activité et avoir beaucoup d’apprentis mécaniciens. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit acheter unterrain et mettre ses enfants à l’aise.
texts.en:
Kodjo Mensah is a 33-year-old man who is married to a woman who sells porridge. He has two children and has been working as an automobile mechanic and a seller of spare parts since 2001. He repairs all kinds of  cars in his garage in Bè-Kpota. He buys spare parts at the Autonomous Port of  Lomé and from Ghana. 

Kodjo Mensah has requested his first loan cycle at WAGES to buy motors for cars. In the next few years, he would like to grow his business and to have many apprentice mechanics. 

With the profits, he says he plans to buy a plot of land and provide his children with a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy motors for cars

loans.name: Marie Georgette

texts.fr: Marie est mariée et mère d'un enfant. Elle vit dans une location dans la capitale économique du Bénin. Elle a pour activité la vente des produits cosmétiques et des pagnes qu'elle expose dans une boutique non loin de son domicile. Elle s'approvisionne à Cotonou et quelques fois au Nigeria. Ses clients se situent en majorité dans sa zone résidentielle et dans les zones environnantes. Marie mène son activité depuis plus de 5 ans et en a acquis une bonne maîtrise. Au terme du remboursement de son crédit à FINADEV, elle a sollicité et obtenu le renouvellement afin de renouveler son stock pour faire face aux exigences de ses clients. Elle compte tirer un revenu supplémentaires de son activité grâce à ce prêt et augmenter sa participation à la satisfaction des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Marie is married with one child. She rents a dwelling in the economic capital of Benin. She sells cosmetics and pagnes (colorful West African cloth) in a shop near her home. She buys her stock in Cotonou, sometimes also in Nigeria. Her customers are mostly from her own neighborhood and surrounding areas. 

Marie has been running her business for over 5 years and has a good command of her activity. 

Having reimbursed her loan with FINADEV, she obtained a renewal to replenish her stock in order to meet customer demand. She expects this funding to help her earn more from her activity, which would allow her to increase her contribution to the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 20 boxes of hair extensions

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Maria Dolores es una joven de 33 años de edad, quien vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada San Francisco de la Palmera, localizada en San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta comunidad rural presenta mucho potencial de desarrollo, ya que a través de las actividades agrícolas es que ha logrado desarrollar actividades conexas y de servicios en la comunidad, tales como el ganado de engorde y la oportunidad de pequeños comercios y microempresas entre otros.

Desde unos meses Maria Dolores inicio su negocio con una Tienda Bazar. El cual es muy beneficioso para la comunidad, ya que se vende toda clase de artículos que los vecinos del lugar necesitan a diario.

Actualmente Maria Dolores está solicitando un microcrédito de ¢500,000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de más mercancía para la tienda, para que continúe siendo de mucho provecho y utilidad para los vecinos.

Con esta inversión espera que su negocio crezca mucho mas. Todo esto ayudará a mejorar sus condiciones de vida y así poder seguir adelante y superarse como familia.

Maria Dolores es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal San Francisco de la Palmera, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores is a young woman who is 33 years of age. She lives with her family in the community of San Francisco de La Palmera, which is located in San Carlos in Alajuela Province. This rural community has great potential for development since there are already existing businesses tied to agriculture, such as raising cattle, and available community services. There is also opportunity for small retailers, microenterprises, and other ventures.

A few months ago, Maria Dolores started her own business – a bazaar. This has been very beneficial to her community because she sells all types of products to her neighbors on a daily basis.

Maria Dolores is currently requesting a microloan in the amount of 500,000 CRC so that she can buy more merchandise for her store. This will allow her to continue providing great benefit and value to her neighbors. With this investment, she hopes that her business will grow much more. All of this assistance will help improve her living conditions, thus enabling her to move forward and succeed with her family.

Maria Dolores is a member of the Communal Credit Enterprise of San Francisco de La Palma, one of the 110 member organizations that make up EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be her first loan and she hopes to continue growing on a personal and financial level. In addition, she will be an active participant in her local credit organization.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her bazaar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood for two doors for her house.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es: Inés tiene 52 años, es una mujer alegre, amable y muy emprendedora, es madre de siete hijos de los cuales solo dos de ellos viven con ella, pues los demás son mayores e independientes. Es así que juntos viven en su casa propia propia. El trabajo de Inés comienza cuando sale muy temprano a la chacra, pues ahí cultiva, riega y preparar la tierra para sembrar camu camu, además se dedica a la apicultura en donde recolecta miel de abeja. Tiene 23 años trabajando, pues cuando era joven sus padres le cedieron una espacio de tierra para que pueda sembrar, ahora ella esta enseñando a sus dos menores hijos quienes después de volver del colegio se van a ayudarla y así aprenden de la agricultura. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede compartirlo con sus hijos y esta con ellos; asimismo de lo que cosecha son enviados a la ciudad de Lima, donde su hijo mayor se encarga de venderlos, espera poder mantenerse así y mas adelante empezar con otro tipo de siembra. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado comprará semillas de camu camu para la siguiente siembra, asimismo contratará jornaleros para para que le ayuden a sembrar pimiento y así iniciar en una nueva actividad.
texts.en:
Inés is 52 years old and a cheerful, friendly, and enterprising woman. She is the mother of seven children, but only two still live with her. The others are grown and independent. Inés and her family live in their own home. Her works begins when she leaves for her farm very early. She cultivates, irrigates, and prepares the land for growing “camu camu” berries. In addition, she is a beekeeper and collects honey from her hives. Inés has been working for 23 years. When she was a young woman, her parents left her a plot of land to use for farming. Now she teaches her two youngest children after they return home from school. They help her with her work and also learn about farming. What she enjoys most about her work is being able to share with her children and spend time with them. After being harvested, her crops are sent to the city of Lima where her oldest son is in charge of selling them. Inés hopes that by maintaining her farm she will be able to begin planting other types of crops in the future.

This will be her fourth loan with MFP and she hopes to receive everyone’s support so that she can continue her work. The amount she requested will be used to buy “camu camu” seeds for the next planting. Inés will also hire workers to help her with planting peppers so that she can start a new crop.

loans.use: to purchase "camu camu" seeds and to hire workers to help with planting.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
La Señora Ramona tiene 51 años. Ella está casada con el Señor Luciano y tienen tres hijos mayores de edad. Una de sus hijas tuvo que partir a trabajar al exterior, con lo cual le pudo ayudar a iniciar su taller de costura. Empezó tomando pedidos particulares de confección sobre medida, luego fue visitando oficinas y sus propias clientes la recomendaban con otras personas.
Hoy ya cuenta con una clientela formada, también confecciona uniformes para una escuela y el uniforme para las docentes. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, le encanta lo que hace y agradece por tener siempre muchos pedidos y trabajo.
Necesita de este crédito para comprar un lote de telas aprovechando una oferta que se le presentó. Pues ya debe iniciar la confección de prendas para esta temporada de Primavera que inicia. Su anhelo es que su hija pueda regresar al país y estar juntas nuevamente.
texts.en:
Romana, age 51, is married to Luciana and has three adult children.  One of her daughters had to leave to work abroad.  That was able to help her start her seamstress shop.  She started taking private custom orders.  Then she visited offices, and her customers recommend her to other people.  She now has an established clientele.

She also makes uniforms for a school and the uniforms for the teachers.  She defines herself as a tenacious and very hard-working woman.  She loves what she does, and she is grateful to always have a lot of orders and work.  

She needs the loan to buy bundles of fabric in order to take advantage of an offer that has presented itself to her.  She now needs to start making clothes for this spring season that is starting.

She yearns for her daughter to be able to come back to Paraguay and to be together again.

loans.use: to buy fabric to use in her seamstress shop.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr:
Akouavi est une femme de 30 ans. Elle est mariée à un agent commercial. Elle a 01 enfant.
Akouavi travaille comme revendeuse de produits pharmaceutiques depuis 2009. Elle fait ce commerce à la devanture de sa maison. Elle achète les produits à Lomé.
Akouavi a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des produits pharmaceutiques. 
Dans les prochaines années, Akouavi voudrait diversifier ses offres de médicament. Elle veut assurer la scolarité de son enfant jusqu’à sa maturité.
texts.en: Akouavi is a 30-year-old woman. She is married to a salesman. She has one child. Akouavi has been selling pharmaceutical products since 2009. She does this in the storefront of her house. She buys the products in Lomé. Akouavi applied for her first loan at WAGES in order to buy pharmaceutical products. In the coming years, Akouavi would like to diversify her medicinal offerings. She wants to ensure her child’s education until adulthood.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Olvin Daniel

texts.es:
Olvin Daniel es un microempresario que se dedica a la balconeria, tiene 31 años de edad, es casado, tiene tres hijos varones, y reside en la colonia Poncaya en el municipio de Patuca. 

Olvin aprendió de su oficio gracias a un vecino de él, ya que éste tenía un taller y le dio la oportunidad de desempeñarse e ir aprendiendo poco a poco cada una de las actividades que se realizaban en el taller. Luego de unos año él se decidió a instalar su propio local y aunque al inicio fue un tanto dificil ya que no contaba con las herramientas necesarias, Olvin no se dejo vencer por las adversidades y siguió adelante, y actualmente cuenta con poco trabajo pero le da lo necesario para el sostenimiento de su familia. Su horario laboral inicia desde muy temprano por la mañana y culmina por las tardes, y su hijo de 8 años luego de regresar de la escuela le ayuda. 

El prestamo que Olvin esta solicitando lo necesita para comprar metal, celosías y pintura, y tambien para pagar el flete que llevará estos materiales hasta su lugar de residencia, ya que para adquirirlos tiene que viajar al municipio de Catacamas. Con el apoyo de este prestamo podra sacar unos trabajos que ya tiene encargados.

Su esperanza es que la situacion economica mejore en su comunidad y asi poder tener trabajo para mantener a su esposa e hijos. Tiene tres ciclos en FAMA y ha sido un cliente puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Olvin Daniel is a micro-entrepreneur who makes balconies. He is 31 years old, married, and has three sons. Olvin lives in the subdivision of Poncaya in the town of Patuca.

He learned this trade from a neighbor. Olvin has a studio, which gave him the opportunity to gradually learn each of the components required to operate his business. A few years later, he decided to open his own shop but the start was difficult because he did not have the necessary tools. Olvin was not discouraged by adversity and pressed forward. He now has some work that gives him what he needs to support his family. His work schedule begins very early in the morning and ends in the afternoon. His eight-year-old son helps him when he comes home from school.

The loan Olvin is requesting will be used to buy metal, lattices, and paint. He will also pay the transportation costs to have these materials delivered to his home. Otherwise, he would have to travel to the town of Catacamas. With the help from this loan, he will be able to proceed with some of his outstanding jobs.

Olvin hopes that the economic situation in his community will improve so that he will have work to support his wife and children. He has participated in three loan cycles with FAMA and is a client who is prompt with his payments.

loans.use: to buy metal, lattices, and paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his final semester and to buy cooking supplies.

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria, vive con sus dos hijos, se dedica a la venta de refrescos de horchata y venta de verduras, su puesto está ubicado en el mercado municipal.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar verduras: papas, tomates, chiles, zanahorias, esta será una gran ayuda para ella y fortalecer el negocio, con suficientes productos para la venta.
El objetivo de ella es mejorar cada día, con la oportunidad de préstamos que le sirvan de apoyo.
texts.en:
Gloria lives with her two children and works selling horchata drinks (a drink made from tiger nuts), and selling vegetables.  Her stall is located in the municipal market.

She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables: potatoes, tomatoes, chili peppers and carrots.  This will be a great help to her and will strengthen her business by having sufficient products for sale.

Her goal is to improve every day, with the opportunity for loans helping her.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes, chili peppers and carrots for her business.

loans.name: Labeono

texts.fr:
Laboeno est une femme âgée de 34 ans. Elle est mariée å un soudeur. Elle a 03 enfants.
Laboeno travaille comme revendeuse depuis 3 ans. Elle vend des tissus et des bijoux de façon ambulante. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. 
Laboeno a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des tissus et des bijoux en argent. 
Dans les prochaines années, Laboeno voudrait ouvrir une grande boutique.
texts.en: Laboeno is a 34-year old woman. She is married to a welder. She has two children. Laboeno has been working as a vendor for three years. She sells fabrics and jewelry as a street vendor. She buys her goods in Lomé. Laboeno has requested her first loan from wages in order to purchase fabrics and silver jewelry. In the years to come, Laboeno would like to open a real store.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seafood: shrimp, lobster, and different types of fish.

loans.name: Hever Anthonyn

texts.es:
Hever, vive con sus padres, el es soltero y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, trabaja como panificador y vendedor de pan desde hace 5 años.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina, azúcar,huevos; dicho préstamo la ayudara a Hever para mejorar la disponibilidad de materiales para aumentar la producción, también mejorar su vivienda.
Su aspiración es mejorar la producción, tener acceso a préstamos con su buena calificación y en un futuro formar su propio hogar.
texts.en:
Hever lives with his parents.  He is unmarried, and works baking and selling bread.  He has been working as a baker and bread-seller for the last five years.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, and eggs: this loan will help Hever improve his supplies availability and increase his production; it will also help him to improve his home.

His aspiration is to improve his production, gain access to loans with his good credit, and in future to form his own household.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and eggs.

loans.name: Mujeres Encantadoras Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son D. la ciudad D. Caacupé, ellas se unieron con el propósito D. poder ayudar en sus casas con los gastos que diariamente surgen. Se definen como luchadoras, emprendedoras y muy creativas. Ellas son muy conocidas en el barrio por la unión que tienen y demuestran. Actualmente esta integrado por 10 mujeres, quienes se encuentran trabajando dentro del tercer ciclo del programa.
Una D. las miembros es la señora Lucia, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. tortas, comenta que le va muy bien y que tiene mucho trabajo, pues sus vecinos del barrio siempre le hacen pedidos cuando hay fiestas y todo tipo D. eventos. Comenta que quiere poder seguir creciendo con su micro emprendimiento, por lo que le gustaría poder seguir invirtiendo en el.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. harina, levaduras, azúcar, colorantes y otros insumos necesarios para la elaboración D. las tortas que prepara.
texts.en:
The women of the group in question are from the city of Caacupé.  They got together with the goal of being able to help in their homes with the expenses that come up on a daily basis.  They characterize themselves as fighters, enterprising, and very creative.  They are very well known in the neighborhood for the unity that they have and demonstrate.  Currently there are 10 women in the group working in the third cycle of the program.

One of the members is Lucía, who makes and sells cakes.  She comments that it's going very well for her and that she has a lot of work, since her neighbors always order from her when there are parties and all types of events.  She wants to continue growing with her micro-enterprise, for which reason she would like to continue investing in it.

Lucía is requesting the loan to buy flour, yeast, sugar, food coloring, and other ingredients necessary for the cakes she makes.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, food coloring, and other ingredients to make cakes.

loans.name: Komi

texts.fr:
Komi est un homme de 36 ans. Il est marié à une revendeuse. Il n’a pas d’enfant.
Komi travaille comme électronicien depuis 2003. Il répare les télévisions dans son atelier situé dans un quartier de la place. Il achète les pièces de réparation au port autonome de Lomé. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est que les pièces qu’il achète sont parfois vétustes.
Komi a requis son premier cycle de prêt à  WAGES afin d’acheter des télévisions d’occasion. Dans les prochaines années, Komi voudrait agrandir son commerce.
texts.en: Komi is 36 years old and married to a saleswoman. The couple have no children. Komi has been working as an electrician since 2003. He fixes televisions in a local workshop and buys spare parts from the Autonomous Port of Lomé. His main problem is that the parts he buys are occasionally obsolete, so Komi is requesting his first loan from WAGES to buy some second-hand televisions. In the next few years, he would like to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy second-hand televisions.

loans.name: Mauro Gregorio

texts.es:
Mauro es un hombre padre de dos hijos pequeños de 3 y 7 años. Vive junto a su esposa e hijos en un barrio urbano marginal del cantón "Santo Domingo". Nos cuenta que el lugar donde vive carece de servicios básicos siendo esto un gran obstáculo ya que no cuentan con un seguro médico y las enfermedades de la familia son una preocupación diaria.
Mauro tiene un negocio de venta de pequeños juguetes plásticos, así como artículos de bisutería en un puesto ambulante. Lo ayuda su esposa, nos cuenta que aprendió este negocio por unos amigos y ya que tenía necesidad de trabajar para sostener su hogar. El tiene planes de incrementar su mercadería y comprar un horno que le permita fabricar bocadillos de comida rápida los cuales los pueda vender y así obtener mejores ingresos.

Como todo buen padre su más grande anhelo es poder ver a sus hijos profesionales y sobre todo dar una mejor calidad de vida a toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mauro is the father of two young children, ages 3 and 7. He lives with his wife and children in a marginalized urban neighborhood in the canton of Santo Domingo. Mauro says that the place where he lives still lacks basic services, but his greatest obstacle is not having medical insurance. Illnesses in his family are a daily worry.

Mauro has a business selling small plastic toys and trinkets from a mobile stand. He has help from his wife. Mauro says he learned about the business from some friends since he needed the work to support his household. He plans to increase his merchandise and also buy an oven for making fast food snacks that he can sell as a way of generating more income.

Like any good father, his greatest wish is to see his children become professionals and provide his entire family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business and an oven for making fast food snacks to sell.

loans.name: Ayewaho

texts.fr:
Ayewaho  est une femme de 32 ans. Elle est mariée å un  frigoriste. Elle a 01enfant.  
Ayewaho travaille revendeuse des produits d’alimentation générale(les bidons d’huile, les sacs de riz, les boite de sucre) depuis 6 ans. Elle vend ses produits à toute personne à la devanture de sa maison. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Ayewaho a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des bidons d’huile, des sacs de riz et des boites de conserve. 
Dans les prochaines années, Ayewaho veut agrandir son activité et vendre encore de nouveaux produits.
texts.en: Ayewaho is 32 years old and married to a refrigeration engineer. The couple have one child. Ayewaho has been selling food products (cans of oil, sacs of rice, boxes of sugar) for 6 years. She sells her merchandise in front of her house and buys her supplies in Lomé. Her main challenge is the competition. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES so that she can restock on oil, rice and canned goods. Over the next few years, Ayewaho would like to expand her range of products and grow her business.

loans.use: to restock on food products for resale.

loans.name: Olga Marita

texts.es:
La señora Olga es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, es soltera y tiene dos hijos a su cargo.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de refrescos en la esquina de una iglesia, sitio muy transitado diariamente, uno de sus hijos es el que le ayuda.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: una olla grande, 1 saco de carbón, 14 cientos de cocona (fruta), 1 saco de azúcar, 2 coladores grandes, 1 embudo, 1 jarra.
Con estos utensilios podrá trabajar con más comodidad.

Su trabajo no es difícil pero tiene que dedicarse casi todo el día para que pueda vender más y poder reponer sus insumos y generar más productos.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por ayudarle con el capital que necesitaba para iniciar su negocio y tener con qué mantener a sus hijos que dependen de ella.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the communal bank Nuevas Amigas (New Friends) in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 45 years old, signle, and has two children in her care. 

For 10 years she has been working with Manuela Ramos. She works selling refreshments at the corner of a church, a very busy place each day. One of her children helps her. 

With her new loan of S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles she will buy: a large ceramic jar, one bag of charcoal, 1,400 Cocona (fruit), one bag of sugar, two large strainers, one funnel, and one pot. With these items she can work more comfortably.  

Her work is not hard but she has to work almost the whole day in order to sell more, replenish her supplies, and make more items to sell. She thanks Manuela Ramos for helping her with the working capital she needs to begin her business and to do what she must in order to care for her children who depend on her.

loans.use: to buy sugar, a large pot, and charcoal

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco, se dedica a la agricultura cosecha: pipián, maíz, frijoles, vive con su esposa, este oficio, lo aprendió de su padre ya tiene 3 años de trabajar en los cultivos, para esto requiere tiempo por eso todos los días trabaja de lunes a domingo no tiene un horario establecido, ademas trabaja en serigrafia, haciendo rotulos publicitarios.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar los fertilizantes, y de esa forma tener muy buena cosecha, y obtener buenos ingresos de su venta con los clientes y dejar una parte para el sustento de su familia.
El sueño de Francisco es que este año sea muy productivo, y sacar más ganancias para beneficio de la familia, tambien quiere capacitarse en el area de al serigrafia para mejorar el trabajo.
texts.en:
Francisco works as a farmer.  He plants pipián (a type of squash), corn, and beans.  He lives with his wife.  He learned to farm from his father and he has done this work for three years.  He does this work every day from Monday to Sunday but does not have a set schedule.  He also works doing screen printing, making advertising signs.  

He will use this loan to purchase fertilizers so that he will have a good harvest and earn a good profit from his sales to his customers and leave part to support his family.

Francisco's dream is that this year is very productive and that he earns more income to benefit his family.  He also wants to get training in screen printing to improve his work.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Mitsi Jhoanny

texts.es:
La señora Mitzi es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos.
Lleva 4 ciclos trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y ha podido hacerse de un pequeño capital que lo viene invirtiendo en los productos de belleza que vende, su trabajo es independiente y le permite atender a sus hijos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 4 colonias para hombres, 2 juegos de aretes, 1 polvo compacto, 1 lápiz labial, 1 shampoo, 2 colonias para bebe, 2 crema para manos, 1 talco para niño, 1 crema liporeductora.
Tiene que trabajar porque no quiere que le falte nada a sus hijos, la pensión que recibe por sus hijos no alcanza para cubrir todas sus necesidades, por eso agradece que Manuela le este ayudando brindándole los préstamos que solicita cada ciclo.
texts.en:
Mitzi is a member of the communal bank Nuevas Amigas in the district of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 31 years old and is a single mother with two children. 

She has been working through four loan cycles with Manuela Ramos and she has been able to get a little working capital which she then invests in the beauty products she sells. She works independently, and it allows her to care for her children.

With her new loan of S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles she will buy: four lotions for men, two sets of earrings, one compact powder, one lip liner, one shampoo, lotions for babies, two hand creams, one talcum powder for babies, and one anti-cellulite cream. 

She has to work because she doesn't want her children to lack anything. The allowance she receives for her children is not enough to pay for the necessities. For this reason she thanks Manuela who has helped to make possible the loans she asks for each cycle.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.es: Jimmy tiene 24 años, es un joven emprendedor y alegre, convive con su pareja con quien tiene una hija de tres años. Juntos intentan brindar una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida a su pequeña hija. EL trabajo de Jimmy empieza muy temprano cuando se dirige a su taller de vehículos, pues él se dedica a arreglar vehículos motorizados, motos, mototaxis, cortadoras, etc. Trabaja en una taller que alquiló junto a dos amigos, pero cada uno de manera independiente. Tiene ya cuatro años en esta actividad por lo que ha logrado tener muchos clientes, que ante cualquier pequeño problema acuden a él. Lo que le gusta la actividad que realiza, además que esta enn contacto con sus clientes. Por ahora le esta yendo bien, ya que siempre tiene clientes, por ello desea tener su propio taller. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, y espera poder seguir recibiendo los préstamos como en anteriores veces, ya que significa un crecimiento en su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará pieza y repuestos para reparar su mototaxi, además comprar herramientas que son necesarios en su taller.
texts.en:
Jimmy is 24 years old. He is a young and happy entrepreneur who lives with his partner with whom he has a three year old daughter. Together they want to give their young daughter a good education and a better quality of life. 

Jimmy's work begins very early when he goes to his automotive shop, then he sets to work repairing vehicles, motorcycles, motor taxis, and lawnmowers. He works in a shop he rents along with two friends, but each works independently. He has been working for four years in this business and for this reason he's gotten many clients who come to him for any small problem. For this reason he likes the business he's creates as well as the contact with his clients. For now things are going well since he always has clients and therefore he wants to have his own shop. 

This will be his third loan with MFP, and he hopes to be able to continue receiving loans as he has in the past since this means his business will grow. With the amount requested, he will buy parts and spares to repair his motortaxi also well as tools that are needed in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and tools for his automotive shop.

loans.name: Talya Kandyce

texts.es:
La señora Talya es socia del banco comunal Las Colinas del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo es profesor de profesión.
Cuenta con una bodega bien surtida instalada en su propia casa, lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos dos años,  cuando tiene que salir para comprar su mercadería una de sus hermanas le ayuda en la bodega.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles  comprará: 2 paquetes de pañales pamper, 5 paquetes de papel higiénico, 1 caja de conservas, 1 caja de leche, 1 caja de nescafe, 1 saco de azúcar, 1 saco de arroz, 2 jabas de gaseosas, 1 caja de galletas, 1 caja de pilas, 1 paquete de vela, 1 paquete de sal.
Con estos productos surtirá mas su bodega, está al pendiente de todo lo que hace falta para poder ofrecer más variedad de productos, se da tiempo para atender a sus hijos pequeños y también para atender las cosas de su casa.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos obtenidos y espera seguir trabajando con esta organización que brinda una gran ayuda a las mujeres trabajadoras.
texts.en:
Señora Talya is a member of Las Colinas Community Bank in Yarinacocha District, in the department of Ucayali. She is 31 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband is a teacher. Talya runs a well-stocked store from her house. She's worked with Manuela Ramos for two years. When she has to leave the house to buy merchandise, one of her sisters takes over in the store. 

With her new loan of S/.2,000, she will buy two cartons of Pampers diapers, five packages of toilet paper, a box of canned food, a box of milk, a box of Nescafe coffee, a sack of sugar, a sack of rice, two crates of soft drinks, a box of cookies, a box of batteries, a package of candles, and a container of salt. With these products, she will better stock her store. Tayla is always on the look out for what is missing in her store so she can offer a greater variety of items to her customers. She will have more time to look after her small children and to take care of household matters.

Talya is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans she has received and hopes to continue working with this organization that brings so much support to working women.

loans.use: to buy milk, canned goods, diapers, sugar etc.

loans.name: Kossiwa Délali

texts.fr:
Kossiwa Délali est une femme de 36ans. Elle est mariée à un fonctionnaire. 
Kossiwa Délali travaille comme revendeuse de matériels scolaires depuis 3 ans. Elle fait le commerce  ambulant des fournitures scolaires. Elle achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la mévente après les rentrées scolaires.
Kossiwa Délali a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des fournitures scolaires. 
Dans les prochaines années, Kossiwa Délali désire ouvrir sa propre boutique.
texts.en:
Kossiwa Délali is 36 years old and married to a civil servant. She has been selling educational materials for 3 years and sells her products on the street. She gets her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé. Her main challenge is getting through the period of low sales after the beginning of the school year. 

Kossiwa Délali is requesting her first loan from WAGES so that she can buy more school supplies. Sometime in the next few years, she would like to open her own shop.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for resale.

loans.name: Luz Eglantina

texts.es:
La señora Luz es socia del banco comunal Las Colinas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 61 años de edad, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos, tres de ellos son mayores de edad y la ultima se encuentra estudiando, todos viven con ella.
Lleva 11 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, el primer préstamo le fue de mucha ayuda, con este dinero compró sus materiales y se puso a trabajar confeccionando ropas, sábanas y otros pedidos.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 20 metros de tela para sabana, 5 rollitos de cinta satinada, 6 hilos de diferentes colores, 2 tizas sastre.
Las sábanas que confecciona las vende al crédito, los pagos que le hacen son diarios, de esta manera puede seguir invirtiendo en los materiales que necesita.
Tiene el apoyo de sus tres hijos mayores que le pasan una pequeña pensión y hacen los pagos de los gastos básicos de sus casa. Esta agradecida con Manuela Ramos porque fue de gran ayuda  en esos  días difíciles, cuando inició en el negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Luz is a member of Las Colinas Community Bank in Calleria District, in the department of Ucayali. She is 61 years old, married, and has four children, three of whom are adults, and one younger daughter who is still at school. They all live with Luz.

She has had loans with Manuela Ramos for the last eleven years. The first was a great help to her as she was able to buy supplies so she could begin to make clothing, sheets, and other items that had been ordered.

With this new loan of S/.2,000 she will buy 20 metres of material for sheets, five rolls of satin ribbon, six reels of different coloured thread, and two pairs of dressmakers scissors. She sells the sheets on credit; the repayments are made on a daily basis. In this way she is always able to buy the materials she needs.

Luz gets a small amount of money from her three adult children who also pay the basic expenses of the household. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos as the organization was a great help to her in those difficult days when she was starting her business.

loans.use: to buy material and other sewing supplies

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, tiene la edad 36 de años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos actualmente. El pretende con el crédito comprar abarrotes para el abastecimiento de su local. El cuenta con un abastecedor donde es muy accesible a cualquier persona con sus precios para la venta de mercadería. El cuenta con varios años de experiencia y lo que quiere es incrementar mas sus ventas en esta temporada que viene para así obtener buenas ganancias. El tiene como meta aumentar las ganancias y darle a su padres una ayuda extra para así tener una mejor calidad de vida y poder cumplir unos proyectos de vida que tiene el planeados para su futuro.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis is 36 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings. He is seeking a loan to buy groceries for his stall. The supplies he sells are accessible to all as the prices are good. He has several years of experience and wants to make more sales in the forthcoming season so he can earn more money.

Luis's goal is to increase his income so he can give his parents extra help and provide them with a better quality of life. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR, and he hasn't had any loans previously with state banks. FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Julieta Del Rosario

texts.es:
Julieta es una señora de 25 años de edad quien vive con su esposo e hijos, en una pequeña comunidad llamada la Trinchera de Pital localizada en la provincia de Alajuela, cuyas principales actividades productivas son la ganadería y la agricultura, donde destaca el cultivo de la pina; siendo estas  comercializadas principalmente en los mercados internacionales. Por esta razón, el desarrollo de la comunidad ha venido creciendo en los últimos anos generando una mayor demanda de productos y servicios brindando mayores oportunidades de trabajo.

Julieta se dedica a creación de prendas, para todo tipo de persona. Ella vende sus costuras a los vecinos de la comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad.

Actualmente Julieta está solicitando un microcrédito de₡600.000 (seiscientos mil colones), para la compra de materiales de costura.

Con esta inversión espera que su microempresa crezca más, para poder atender a mas clientes y ofrecerles mejores prendas. Todo esto ayudara a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

Julieta es socia de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su segundo préstamo y con el espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Julieta is 25 years old. She lives with her husband and children in a small community called Trinchera de Pital which is located in the province of Alajuela, a province whose main activities are livestock production and agriculture, with a focus on the cultivation of pineapples which are mainly marketed overseas in international markets. For this reason, community development has been growing in recent years creating an increased demand for products and services providing greater job opportunities.

Julieta makes clothes for every type of person. She sells her garments to residents in the community who are very satisfied with the quality. 

Julieta is currently applying for a small loan of ₡600.000 (six hundred thousand colones) (CRC) to buy material for sewing. With this investment she hopes to grow her small business more, serve more clients and offer them better clothes. All this will help improve her living conditions.

Julieta is a member of the communal bank Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, one of 110 member organisations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

This will be her second loan and with it she hopes to continue growing both personally and economically as well as actively participating in the communal bank of her community

loans.use: to buy material for sewing.

loans.name: Cristian Alejandro

texts.es:
Cristian es un hombre soltero de 24 años que vive en el barrio "20 de Octubre" del cantón Santo Domingo de la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. Casi toda la provincia goza de un clima tropical húmedo, su cabecera provincial es una de las más densamente pobladas del Ecuador. 

Desde los 18 años el decidió trabajar para poder costear sus estudios. Cristian se ha esforzado mucho para llevar ambas actividades. El es un vendedor puerta a puerta de calzado, tiene ya conformada su cartera de clientes pero ahora quiere ampliar su zona comprando más mercadería. Además necesita completar el pago que debe hacer por concepto de su matrícula de estudios. Para esto el solicitó a Fundación Alternativa un crédito. Cristian comenta que le agrada mucho la atención que su asesor de crédito le brinda ya que la información es clara.

Su gran meta es concluir sus estudios y ser un profesional para ponerse al servicio de la comunidad. Sueña también con tener su empresa propia.
texts.en:
Cristian is 24 years old and single. He lives in a neighbourhood called "20 de Octubre" in the canton of Santo Domingo in the Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province. Almost the entire province has a humid tropical climate all year round. Its provincial capital is one of the most densely populated in Ecuador.

From the age of 18, he decided to work to pay for his studies. Cristian has worked hard to do both. He is a door-to-door salesman of shoes. He has already built up a customer base but now wants to expand his territory by buying more merchandise. In addition, he needs to complete the payment of his tuition fees. For this he asked Fundación Alternativa for a loan. Cristian says that he likes the attention his credit counsellor offers him alot as the information is clear.

His goal is to finish his studies and become a professional in order to serve the community. He also dreams of owning his own business.



.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition fees and buy merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
La formación de comité Kuña Guapa lo inicio la Señora Aida. Actualmente el comité se encuentra en el primer ciclo con 9 integrantes. Son mujeres muy activas con el compromiso que a través del esfuerzo laboral logran el sostenimiento de la familia y generar sus propios ingresos.
La Señora Rosa se dedica como comerciante, es decir a la venta de todo tipo de artículos, como ser ropas, artículos de cotillón y demás. Comenta que gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, brindándoles lo esencial para tener una vida digna y decorosa. Desea poder seguir con su emprendimiento, y es por eso que solicita el préstamo.
Pide el crédito para la compra de ropas, artículos de cotillón, bazar y demás para abastecer su negocio y de esa forma poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece desde ya a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
Señora Aida is the person who founded the Kuña Guapa committee.  Currently the committee is in its first lending cycle, with nine members.  They are very active women with the commitment to sustain their families and generate their own incomes through their hard work.

Señora Rosa works as a retailer, that is to say she sells all different kinds of things such as clothes, party favors, and other things.  She comments that thanks to her efforts, she has been able to move her family ahead in life, providing them with a decent and dignified life. She wants to be able to continue with her venture, as this is why she is requesting the loan.

She is asking for the loan for the purchase of clothing, party favors, variety items and other things to stock up her store and so be able to meet her customers' demands.

She is grateful to the Foundation for the opportunity that is being provided to her.

loans.use: to buy clothing, party favors, variety items, and other things.

loans.name: Avelino

texts.es:
El señor Avelino tiene 53 años de edad, es oriundo de la ciudad de Roque González está casado hace más de 32 años con Señora Petrona de 52 años de edad, tienen 5 hijos juntos, 2 en edad escolar y 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y gracias a sus padres ya son todos profesionales.
Hace 20 años empezó con una pequeña despensa en su domicilio, donde la Señora atendía mientras él se dedicaba a comprar animales para faenarlo y luego vender la carne en la despensa. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando la familia junta en la despensa, ya que es el centro de compra más importante y concurrida  de la ciudad.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas y artículos de primera necesidad como harina, yerba, fideos y arroz en cantidad, ya que el mismo le servirá para abastecer su local y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Avelino is 53 years old and comes from the city of Roque González. He has been married to Petrona, aged 52, for more than 32 years, and together they have five children, 2 who are school-age and 3 who are grown. Thanks to their parents, they are all professionals.  

20 years ago he opened a small store in his house where his wife works while he buys animals to slaughter and later he sells the meat in the store. Currently the family is working together in the store since it is the most important and busy shopping center in the city. 

He is asking for a loan to buy beverages and essential items like flour, herbs, noodles, and rice in quantity since that will allow him to supply his store and satisfy his customers.

loans.use: to buy beverages and essential items.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es: Máximo, de 59 años, es un hombre serio y trabajador, esta separado de su pareja, pero juntos tienen una hija de 20 años, pero aunque no vive con él, siempre la ayuda en sus estudios y en todo lo que ella necesita. El trabajo de Máximo consiste en la compra de productos regionales que producen los caseríos, que se encuentran cerca del distrito. De ahí se dirige a los mercado para venderlo a comerciantes minoristas. Tiene cuatro años dedicándose a este trabajo y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se necesita de poca inversión, ya que las compras las hace en pocas cantidades. Espera que su negocio se consolide para así poder aumentar su capital y comprarse una movilidad más grande, que tanta falta le hace. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, espera poder seguir recibiendo el apoyo de ustedes ya que le es de mucha ayuda el dinero que le prestan. Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos regionales además arreglará su mototaxi para que pueda transportar los productos que obtiene de los caseríos.
texts.en: Máximo, 59, is a serious, hard-working man who is separated from his partner with whom he has a 20-year-old daughter.  Even though his daughter does not live with him, he helps her with her studies and anything she needs.  Máximo's work consists of buying regional merchandise produced by the nearby rural communities in the district.  He takes the products to market and sells them to the retailers.  He has been in business for four years and enjoys his work because it requires little investment for the small quantities he buys.  He hopes the business will become stable so he can increase his capital and buy a larger vehicle, which he needs.  This is his third loan through MFP.  He is counting on your support because he is in great need of the loan.  He plans to use it to buy regional merchandise and fix his motor-taxi to transport the products he buys from the rural communities.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and fix his motor vehicle.

loans.name: Fanny Maria

texts.es:
Fanny de 48 años es una mujer  trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones de crecimiento  en su negocio por eso quiere seguir trabajando en su pequeña tienda en donde vende víveres de primera necesidad como arroz, enlatados, bebidas etc.    

Desea continuar trabajando con ayuda de su hija ya que la tienda le ha ayudado para mejorar su estilo de vida. Tiene aspiraciones de construir mejor su casa ya que la tienda queda en la parte delantera de su casa. Por eso con el préstamo desea comprar cemento, arena para construir mejor su casa. En el futuro desea tener una tienda grande y continuar como cliente en D-MIRO.
texts.en:
Fanny, 48, is a hard-working woman who aspires to expanding her grocery store business where she sells daily consumption items such as rice, canned goods, beverages, etc.

She hopes to continue working with the help of her daughter because the store has helped them improve their lifestyle.  Her goal is to carry out home improvements because the store now occupies the front part of the house.  She plans to use the loan to buy cement and sand for the improvement.  In the future she wants to have a larger store and continue being a D-MIRO customer.

loans.use: To buy cement and sand

loans.name: Balbino

texts.es:
El Señor Balbino es cliente recurrente de nuestra entidad, el mismo vive en la ciudad de Luque, vive en casa propia con su esposa.
Se dedica hace varios años a la fabricación de cepillos y escobas en forma artesanal y los vende en el mercado de dicha ciudad. El mismo es cliente desde el año 2006 y cuenta con 6 créditos cancelados en nuestra entidad. Comenta que tiene una buena clientela y que tiene muchos pedidos siempre. El se considera un hombre muy trabajador, luchador y emprendedor. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por darle un mejor porvenir a su familia, ya que desea evitar que ellos pasen por las mismas privaciones por la que paso el.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de maderas y accesorios, los cuales son insumos necesarios para la fabricación de las escobas. Agradece a la Fundación por la nueva oportunidad que le da, pues de obtener el crédito le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Balbino is a repeat client to our agency. He lives in the city of Luque in his own house with his wife. 

For many years he has worked making traditional brushes and brooms, and he sells them in his city’s market. He has been a client since 2006, and he has had 6 repaid loans with our agency. He says that he is a good client and that he always has many orders. He considers himself to be a hardworking, tenacious, and enterprising man. He says that everything he does is to give his family a better future since he wants to avoid them having to endure the same hardships that he’s been through. 

He is asking for a loan to buy wood and accessories, which are the items needed to make brooms. He thanks the Fundación for this new opportunity that they’ve given him since getting this loan will be a great help.

loans.use: to buy wood and other items to make brooms.

loans.name: Wilmer Alberto

texts.es:
Wilmer es un joven emprendedor de 30 años nacido en Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, provincia de Ecuador. Vive en la parroquia de "Limón" de la misma provincia, en una pequeña finca heredada de su padre. Es soltero y se ha dedicado de lleno a la agricultura. La parroquia "Limón" es conocida porque en ella viven los nativos "Tsáchilas", también conocidos como "Indios Colorados" por el color de su cabello teñido de rojo con un fruto llamado achiote. Según el último censo existen únicamente 2.640 indios colorados en el Ecuador.

Éste joven fue muy afectado por la enfermedad de su padre. El desea continuar con el negocio y además ama la naturaleza. Tiene un espíritu noble y de servicio a la comunidad.

Wilmer siembra en su finca plátano, yuca y cacao. El requiere arreglar la cerca de su propiedad, esto ya que tiene un proyecto para hacer chocolates y de esta manera ayudar a su comunidad dando trabajo a los pobladores del sector. Fundación Alternativa le ha ayudado con su primer crédito considerando la visión de este joven y sus ganas de salir adelante y formar su microempresa.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a young entrepreneur, age 30, who was born in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, a province of Ecuador.  He lives in the "Limón" parish on a small patch of farmland he inherited from his father.  He is single and totally involved in agriculture.  The "Limón" parish is known as the home of the native "Tsáchilas", who are also known as the "Indios Colorados" because they dye their hair red with a fruit called achiote.  According to the last census there are only 2,640 colored indians remaining in Ecuador.

This young man was affected by his father's illness.  He wants to continue with the business and he loves nature.  He has a noble spirit and sense of community service.

Wilmer grows bananas, yucca and cocoa on his farm.  The fence around his property is in need of repair.  He has in mind a project to make chocolate and help the community by giving employment to the local people.  The Fundación Alternativa has helped him with his first loan in view of this young man's business sense and desire to get ahead and form a micro-company.

loans.use: To fix the fence around his small farmland.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora María tiene 45 años y está casada con el Señor Porfirio D. 47 años, tienen 3 hijos todos varones D. 28, 22 y 9 años, estudiando actualmente. 
La señora siempre fue comerciante, contando con varios negocios. Su marido es mecánico automotriz, gracias a lo cual siempre se ayudan mutuamente. Actualmente cuenta con una despensa en su domicilio abasteciendo a los vecinos del lugar, cuenta con varios clientes formados ya que es destacada por la amabilidad con que atienD. a todos. Comenta que uno D. sus sueños es poder abrir un local D. ventas D. lubricantes ya que su marido es mecánico y posee una gran demanda del producto.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. galleta, arroz fideo, azúcar, leche, huevo, aceite, bebidas con lo cual podrá abastecer su negocio y cumplir con la demanda D. sus clientes, ya que desea siempre poder cumplir con ellos.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old and is married to Porfirio who is 47. They have three sons aged 28, 22, and 9 who are now studying. 

María has always been in retail, having several businesses. Her husband is an auto mechanic, and thanks to that they can always help each other. Right now she has a store in her home selling to her neighbors. She has many loyal customers which shows the kindness with which she treats everyone. She says that one of her dreams is to be able to open a local store selling lubricants since her husband is a mechanic and has a great need for that product. 

She is asking for a loan to buy cookies, rice noodles, sugar, eggs, oil, and beverages with which to she will be able to supply her store and meet the demand of her customers since she always wants to be able to please them.

loans.use: to buy cookies, rice noodles, sugar, milk, etc

loans.name: Aurelio Angel

texts.es:
Aurelio es un señor de 63 años de edad, el cual vive con su familia, en la comunidad de Canalette, en la región de Upala, San Carlos en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta provincia ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña. Produce además granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, maíz), frutas, legumbres, tubérculos y hortalizas, una de las principales zonas ganaderas del país especialmente a través de la producción del cantón de San Carlos. Además en la provincia se asientan las plantas procesadoras de leche de la Cooperativa de Productores de Leche Dos Pinos, propiedad de miles de productores de leche. Además en la zona alrededor de la ciudad de Alajuela se ha asentado gran cantidad de empresas manufactureras de exportación. En Alajuela operan las zonas francas de El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos y Bet. 

Desde hace varios años que Aurelio se dedica a la porcicultura, para continuar su negocio, le hace falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados.  El proyecto le es muy interesante.

Actualmente Aurelio está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢600.000 (seiscientos mil colones) para  darle mantenimiento a su chanchera y comprar engorde de cerdos. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio, ya que su meta es poder continuar con su trabajo donde pueda mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Aurelio es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su cuarto préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Aurelio, 63, lives with his family in the Canalette Community in the region of Upala, San Carlos in the province of Alajuela.  This province is the top national producer of coffee and cane sugar.  It also produces basic grains (rice, beans, corn), fruit, vegetables and tubers.  And, it is one of the main livestock farming areas of the country, especially the San Carlos Canton.  The province also has many dairy plants belonging to the Dos Pinos Dairy Producers Co-op which owns thousands of manufacturers.  Around the city of Alajuela there are many export companies.  In Alajuela the free ports of El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos and Bet are in operation.

For several years Aurelio has been involved in raising pigs.  In order to continue his business he needs the basics for it to take off and benefit the neighbors of the community.  The project is very interesting.

Aurelio is currently requesting a micro-loan in the amount of 600,000 CRC to maintain his pig farm and buy pigs.  With this loan he hopes to be able to expand his business, continue working and improve his family's lifestyle.

Aurelio is a member of the communal bank Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette.  It is one of the 110 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.  This will be his fourth loan which he hopes will help both him both personally and economically.  He is an active member of the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Pasteur

texts.es: Pasteur tiene 59 años, es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, es padre soltero de tres hijos que ya son mayores y tienen su propia familia. Él vive en una casa propia sólo y trabajando en su chacra para así darse una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Pasteur es la agricultura, él se levanta muy temprano para dirigirse a sus chacras que esta ubicado a unos cuantos kilómetros de su casa, ahí se dedica al sembrío de frutas cítricas, entre ellos, naranjas, toronjas, limones; además de algunos productos regionales como yuca, plátano y papa. Desde muy joven heredó las tierras de sus padres, quienes le enseñaron a sembrar y arar la tierra; desde entonces se dedica a esta actividad, pero cuando es época de cosecha, necesariamente debe contratar jornaleros, para que lo ayuden en la recolección de frutas. Una vez cosechados, son llevados al mercado de su localidad donde los vende al por mayor y menor, asimismo tiene clientes que son mayoristas, llevando dichos productos a la ciudad de Lima. Espera seguir creciendo junto a su negocio, por tanto éste crédito será primero, y con ello podrá comprar ssemillas de frutas cítricas y madera para hacer cercos y un porton en su chacra, además de contratar jornaleros para que lo ayuden en la siembra.
texts.en: Pasteur, 59, is a responsible, hard-working man who is single and the father of three adult children who have their own families.  He lives alone in his own house and grows crops for a living to improve his lifestyle.  Pasteur gets up early in the morning and goes out to work on his land which is a few kilometers from his house.  He grows citrus fruit such as oranges, grapefruit and lemons, and regional products such as yucca, banana and potatoes.  When he was young he inherited the land from his parents, who taught him how to plough the land and plant the crops, and since then he has been involved in this business.  During harvest time he has to hire help to harvest the fruit.  Then he takes his produce to the local market where he sells both wholesale and retail.  He also has clients who are wholesalers, so he takes his produce to the city of Lima.  He hopes to expand his business.  This is his first loan and he plans to use it to buy citrus fruits, wood to make fences and a gate for his land, and to hire help for the planting season.

loans.use: To buy citrus fruit seeds, hire help and buy wood.

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es:
La señora Genoveva es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 57 años D. edad, está casada y tiene seis hijos.  Su esposo es empleado público.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la confección D. prendas D. vestir para damas, por estos días se encuentra convaleciente a causa D. una fuerte gripe ocasionada por el cambio D. clima.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: una mesa granD. para poder trabajar con sus telas, 10 metros D. tela, 15 kilos D. algodón, ½ docena D. cierres, 6 hilos 1 ciento D. botones, 2 paños D. agujas.
Su trabajo le quita tiempo para poder atender  su casa por eso tiene una persona encargada para los quehaceres  del hogar, D. esa manera pueD. trabajar tranquila. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda y confianza.
texts.en:
Señora Genoveva is a member of the communal bank Nuevas Amigas del Distrito Calleria, in the departamento of Ucayali. She is 57 years old, married and has 6 children. He husband is a public employee.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 10 years and she makes ladies garments. She is currently convalescing after suffering a bad cold caused by the change in climate. 

With her new loan of 2,500.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she is going to buy: a large table to be able to work with her fabrics, 10 metres of fabric, 15 kilos of cotton, half a dozen zippers, 6 units of thread, 1 hundred-pack of buttons and 2 packages of needles. 

Her work takes time away from her housework which is why she has someone to take care of the household chores. In this way she can work in peace. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the help and confidence shown her.

loans.use: to buy 15 kgs of fabric, cotton and a table.

loans.name: Griselda Maricela

texts.es:
Griselda, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en una casa alquilada, ella vende frutas, verduras, mariscos, el negocio lo aprendió de su madre desde hace quince años, todos los días vende de lunes a domingo ya tienes sus clientes y por eso tiene que tener variedad del producto.
El préstamo lo necesita para mejorar su negocio, hacerlo más grande, comprar más mercadería: bananas, naranjas, papas, güisquiles, yuca, tomates; de esa  forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
El objetivo de Griselda es tener una mejor estabilidad económica para su familia y en el futuro comprar un lote para hacer su casa, y ser una buena cliente de calidad.
texts.en:
Griselda lives with her husband and children in a rented home. She sells fruits, vegetables and seafood, a business that she learned from her mother 15 years ago. She works every day, Monday to Sunday, and has an established customer base so she needs to have a variety of products. 

She needs this loan to improve her business and make it bigger by purchasing more merchandise like bananas, oranges, potatoes, chayote, yucca and tomatoes. This is how she will improve her quality of life.

Griselda's objective is to have greater financial stability for her family, and in the future she would like to buy land to build a house. She would like to be a good client.

loans.use: to buy bananas, oranges, potatoes, chayote, yucca and tomatoes.

loans.name: Giovanna

texts.es:
La señora Giovanna es socia del banco comunal Nuevas amigas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos menores de edad.
Lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años, tiene instalado su negocio en el patio de su casa, por las tardes vende comidas al paso así como Juanes, pollo asado, pescado asado, maduros, chorizos.
Por las mañanas prepara sus Juanes, cocina la yuca, prepara su ají y la chicha morada para que todo esté listo a tiempo, luego se dedica a sus hijos.  Esta actividad la realiza todos los días por las tardes/noches, tiene una persona que le ayuda con los asados mientras ella atiende a sus clientes.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará:  1 saco de carbón, un ciento de platos descartables, servilletas, 25 kilos de azúcar, 2 docenas de vasos, 1 docena de platos de losa, ¼ de canela, ¼ de clavo de olor, 1 balde con pico para su chicha, ½ saco de arroz, 1 galón de aceite.
